# init(size:)

**Initializer**

Initializes an empty texture with a specific size.

## Declaration

```swift
init(size: CGSize)
```

## Parameters

- **size**: The size of the texture, in pixels.

## Return Value

An empty mutable texture.

## Discussion

You must call the [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKMutableTexture/modifyPixelData(_:)] method at least once before using this texture.

## Creating an Empty Mutable Texture

- **init(size:pixelFormat:)**: Initializes an empty texture with a specific size and format.
